name: WhatsApp Redesign Present
description:
Why i redesign WhatsApp?, The reason I did a redesign of the WhatsApp application was nothing but exploration of design. I tried to make a different look than before, a look that was easy to use and of course clean. In doing this redesign, I did not do research first because of time constraints, apologize if it is not appropriate.


Check out my work on dribbble and behance
